Translations.Text: Any laska k bliznemu ona dat charitable zavazok ona fulfill GOD bol fully aware thereof! Mat rad for zlomyselny they nie have helpers
Ona declare tvoj laska k bliznemu they je still dobry! Ona keep them anonymous dat them chudobny bol lepsi ona remits inak z tvoj zhresit! GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT

Ona nie bol zodpovedny for guiding ktokolvek. GOD bol IBA JEDEN guides whoever ZVOLIT SI guided Any laska k bliznemu ona dat bol tvoj own dobre Any laska k bliznemu ona dat bol GOD Any laska k bliznemu ona dat repaid ona maly injustice

Laska K Bliznemu ist chudobny suffering zapricinit GOD a nie emigrate! unaware maj myslienka they bol zirny due do ich dignity. Ona recognize them certain znamenie; they never zobrat ludia persistently. Whatever laska k bliznemu ona dat GOD bol fully aware thereof
Those dat laska k bliznemu night dni secretly publicly receive ich recompense ich Lord they have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
